page.title: 06Music in Haverfordwest
page.content: Haverfordwest Male Voice Choir was formed in 1956. They presently number 50 and perform locally in churches and chapels and will take part in the 1000 Voices Concert in the Albert Hall in 1986. H'west Dist. Operatic Society, president Lord Gordon Parry, founded 1981. Shows include; Patience 1981,Pirates of Penzance 1982, My Fair Lady 1984 and in 1985 Brigadoon. Mary Immaculate School Band has been performing for 25 years and is widely travelled and has played for the Pope. H'west Town and County Youth Band conducted by Mr.Joff Swales MBE was formed in 1980. The Two Comprehensive schools both have flourishing Music Departments with two fine orchestras and much individual talent who give concerts and shows of a high standard.
